Articles.Content:
I have experienced the following bugs and glitches using 1.1 so far:

1. I enter the tracking station and select an existing ship and then fly it. But then when I return to the tracking station I am unable to select anything. Further, I am not able to exit the tracking station and I must force close KSP 1.1

 

2. Flying (some) ships causes them to spin wildly out of control and lose many parts

 

3. This one is bad. Suddenly while flying I flipped from map to ship view and the ship was invisible.  After pressing escape the pause menu did not display and I was then unable to rotate camera view. I could still goto map view, but many things were gone and blank. I could go back and click space agency and that made the ship reappear, and able to rotate camera again, but anytime pressing Escape, it would break the game again

 

I have not played KSP for about 6 months because the game has been completely unplayable because of soo many glitches.
